        "yo 'sakṛt paragotrāṇāṃ pakṣacchedakṣaṇamaḥ /	"yaH asakRt para gotrANAm pakzacCeda kzaNamaH /
        śatakoṭidatāṃ bibhrad vibudhendraḥ sa rājate" //	Sata kowidatAm biBrat vibuDa indraH sa rAjate" //
        ityatra puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgayoḥ śatakoṭidatāmityatra dadāti dyatyoḥ	iti atra puMnapuMsaka liFgayoH Sata kowidatAm iti atra dadAti dyatyoH
   dhātvoḥ prakṛtyoścaśleṣaḥ /	DAtvoH prakRtyoH caSlezaH /
        "yena dhvasta" ityādau vibhaktisamāsayorvailakṣaṇyena śleṣaḥ /	"yena Dvasta" ityAdO viBakti samAsayoH vElakzaNyena SlezaH /
        "sarvasvaṃ hara sarvasva" ityatrāpi vakṣyamāṇodāharaṇer'thadvayasyāpi	"sarvasvam hara sarva sva" iti atra api vakzyamANa udAha raNer aTa dvayasya api
   sandehāspadatvād vibhaktiśleṣaḥ /	sandeha Aspada tvAt viBakti SlezaH /
        "dadhate 'sya parāṃ śobhāmaho madhuratābhṛtaḥ" ityādau ca kiṃ	"daDate asya parAm SoBAm ahaH maDura tA BRtaH" ityAdO ca kim
   madhuratāṃ bibhratīti madhuratābhṛto bahavo janāḥ, uta madhuratayā bhṛtaḥ	maDura tAm biBrati iti maDura tA BRtaH bahavaH janAH, uta maDura tayA BRtaH
   kaścid varttata iti bahuvacanaikavacanayoḥ śleṣaḥ /	kaScid varttate iti bahuvacana eka vacanayoH SlezaH /
        kiñca madhuratābhṛta ityatrāpi kkippratyayaktapratyayayoḥ /	kiQca maDura tA BRtaH iti atra api kkippratyayakta pratyayayoH /
        dadhata ityatrāpi ca pakṣe dhādhātorbahuvacanaṃ pakṣe ca	daDate iti atra api ca pakze DADAtoH bahuvacanam pakze ca
   dadhadhātorekavacanaṃ śliṣṭaṃ ca /	daDaDAtoH eka vacanam Slizwam ca /
        tadevamabhidhādūyasaṃvedyapratyayoktitaḥ śleṣālaṅkāraviṣaye	tat evam aBiDAdUya saMvedya pratyaya uktitaH Sleza alaFkAra vizaye
   'ṣṭavidhaśleṣasya sambhavamavicāryya prācīnādhikṣepakāribhirupajīvyaiḥ	azwaviDa Slezasya samBavam avicAryya prAcIna aDikzepa kAriBiH upajIvyEH
   sahālaṃ bahunā vivādena /	sahAlam bahunA vivAdena /
        nanvevaṃ "yena dhvasta" ityādāvapi yasyārthasya prathamaṃ	nanu evam "yena Dvasta" iti AdO= api yasya arTasya praTamam
   buddhyārohaḥ sa vācyo 'stu aparastu vyaṅgyo 'stu kiṃ tatrāpi	budDi ArohaH sa vAcyaH astu aparaH tu vyaFgyaH astu kim tatra api
   śleṣālaṅkārakalpanairiti cennaivam /	Sleza alaFkAra kalpanEH iti ced na evam /
        iha yadi saṃśayajñānaviṣayatvādanirddhāritatvāt "bhadrātmana';	iha yadi saMSaya jQAna vizaya tvAt anirdDArita tvAt "Badra Atmana a;
   ityādau, "hṛdijñeṣu ca vakṣyati'; ityādau ca nirddhāritatvāt	iti AdO, "hRdijQezu ca vakzyati a; ityAdO ca nirdDArita tvAt 
   vṛttidvayakalpanasadbhāve saṃgatiḥ /	vRtti dvaya kalpana sadBAve saMgatiH /
        yattu caṇaḍīdāsapaṇḍitairuktaṃ "vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām"	yat tu caNaxI dAsa paNxitEH uktam "vyaTAm dvayezAm api medinIBRtAm"
   ityādau ubhayābhidhānaṃ cetīti "sandhyāvandanavelāyāṃ mukto 'hamiti	ityAdO uBaya aBiDAnam ca iti iti "sanDyA vandana velAyAm muktaH aham iti
   manyate /	manyate /
        khaṇḍalaḍḍukavelāyāṃ haṇḍamudyamya dhāvati" //	KaNxa laxxuka velAyAm haNxam udyamya DAvati" //
        ityābhāṇakamanukaroti /	iti ABANakam anukaroti /
        kvacidabhidhāṅgīkāre hi bhadrātmana ityādāvapi	kvacid aBiDAFgIkAre hi Badra AtmanaH iti AdO= api
   kimaparāddhamabhidhādvayena /	kim aparAdDam aBiDA dvayena /
        nanvatraiva doṣanirūpaṇaprastāve sandigdhayorarthaśabdayorduṣṭatā,	nanu atra eva doza nirUpaNa prastAve sandigDayoH arTa SabdayoH duzwa tA,
   tat kathaṃ "yena dhvasta" ityādāvabhidhānasaṃśaye alaṅkāratvamapyucyate ?	tat kaTam "yena Dvasta" iti AdO= aBiDAna saMSaye alaFkAra tvam api ucyate ?
   "abalā acalā vā syuḥ"ityādau "āśīḥ paramparāṃvandyām" ityādau ca	"abalA acalAH vA syuH"iti AdO "ASIH paramparAMvandyAm" ityAdO ca
   doṣasthale sandehavaśena vivakṣitaikārthānirddhāraṇādativyagratayā'svādaṃ	doza sTale sandeha vaSena vivakzita eka arTa anirdDAraNAt ati vyagra tayA asvAdam
   prati prātikūlyam /	prati prAtikUlyam /
        iha tu vivakṣitayorapyarthayoranirddhāraṇarūpāyā	iha tu vivakzitayoH api arTayoH anirdDAraNa rUpAyAH 
   vicchittarānukūlyamanubhavasiddham /	vicCitta rAnu kUlyam anuBava sidDam /
        ataeva pūrvatra mahākaveḥ skhalanamanyatra vahvarthapadanirvāhe	ataeva pUrvatra mahA kaveH sKalanam anyatra vahvarTa pada nirvAhe
   prayuktasādhanaṃ sārvalaukikameva /	prayukta sADanam sArvalOkikam eva /
        kiñca pūrvatraikārthasyāsvādapradāne dvitīyārthaḥ pratikūlabhūtaḥ,	kiQca pUrvatra ekArTasya AsvAda pradAne dvitIya arTaH pratikUla BUtaH,
   taṃ haṭhādivākṛṣya tato bahiṣkaroti, iha tu dvayorarthayorekasya	tam haWAt iva AkRzya tatas bahizkaroti, iha tu dvayoH arTayoH ekasya
   buddhyāroheṇāpareṇārthena tannimittakāvyādāvapakarṣatvam /	budDi AroheNa apareNa arTena tad nimittaka avyAdO= apakarza tvam /
        evameva dvayorarthayoḥ nirddhāritatvena	evam eva dvayoH arTayoH nirdDArita tvena
   kavitvavivakṣānubhavasākṣiketi rahasyam /	kavi tva vivakza anuBava sAkzikA iti rahasyam /
        evaṃ "vaurivaṃśadavānala" ityādau vaṃśaśabdāt vyañjanayā baudhitasya	evam "vOri vaMSa dava anala" ityAdO vaMSa SabdAt vyaQjanayA bODitasya
   veṇurūpārthasyaikānvayarūpeṇārthena "gaurvāhīka'; ityādau govahīkayoriva	veNu rUpArTasya eka anvaya rUpeNa arTena "gOrvAhIka a; ityAdO go vahIkayoH iva
   "mukhacandra'; ityādau mukhacandrayoriva tādātmyādrūpakam /	"muKa candra a; ityAdO muKa candrayoH iva tAdAtmyAt rUpakam /
        nanu gaurvāhīka ityādau āropyamāṇagavārthasya utpadyamānānvayabādhaḥ	nanu gOH vAhIkaH ityAdO AropyamANa gava arTasya utpadyamAna anvaya bADaH
        sa ca gavārtho mukhya iti tatra gauṇī lakṣaṇā /	sa ca gavArTaH muKyaH iti tatra gONI lakzaNA /
        iha ca veṇurūpārtho vyaṅgya iti kathaṃ mukhyārthabādhajīvitā	iha ca veNu rUpa arTaH vyaFgyaH iti kaTam muKya arTa bADa jIvitA
   lakṣaṇeti cet ? atraivaṃ saṅgatiḥ /	lakzaNa iti ced ? atra evam saFgatiH /
        yathā khalu "jātirekapadārtha" iti vādināṃ mate prācīnairasmābhiśca	yaTA Kalu "jAtireka padArTa" iti vAdinAm mate prAcInEH asmABiH ca
   ihaiva dvitīyaparicchede saṅketitārthanirūpaṇe pradarśitena nayena	iha eva dvitIya paricCede saFketita arTa nirUpaNe pradarSitena nayena
   jātimātrabodhanād abhidhāyāṃ viratāyāṃ vyaṅgyatvenābhyupagantavyayā vyakte	jAti mAtra boDanAt aBiDAyAm viratAyAm vyaFgya tvena aByupaganta vyayA vyakte
   rūpyamāṇānvayabodhe lakṣaṇā tathehāpi vyaṅgyatvenāha   tsaya	rUpyamANa anvaya boDe lakzaNA taTA iha api vyaFgya tvena aha   tsaya
   veṇurūpārthasya yathāvyaktirūpavyaṅgyasya jātirūpavyaṅgyenāvinābhāvena	veNu rUpa arTasya yaTA vyakti rUpa vyaFgyasya jAti rUpa vyaFgyena AvinA aBAvena
   tadvatpratītiḥ /	tadvat pratItiH /
        "gato 'stamarka'; ityādau "kāntamabhisare';	"gataH astam arka a; ityAdO "kAntam aBisare a;
   tyādivyaṅgyavailakṣaṇyenāvaśyakatvena mukhyaprāyatvaṃ	tyAdi vyaFgya vElakzaNyena AvaSyaka tvena muKya prAya tvam
   davānalāditvasamagrīsamutthitasya veṇurūpārthasyāpīti taulyam /	dava anala Adi tva samagrI samutTitasya veNu rUpa arTasya api iti tOlyam /
        yadvā "so 'yamiṣoriva dīrghadīrghataro vyāpāra" iti matāśrayaṇād	yat vA "saH ayam izoH iva dIrGa dIrGataraH vyApAra" iti mata ASrayaNAt 
   veṇurūparthavaṃśaśabdasyānvayarūpārthavaṃśaśabdena	veNuru uparTa vaMSa Sabdasya anvaya rUpa arTa vaMSa Sabdena
   ekākāratvādabhedopacārād vyaṅgyasya veṇurūpārthasya vidheyatvād	eka AkAra tvAt aBeda upacArAt vyaFgyasya veNu rUpa arTasya viDeya tvAt 
   mukhyārthatvamiti /	muKya arTa tvam iti /
        śleṣādityasya varṇetyādau pratyekamanvayaḥ /	Sleza Adityasya varNa ityAdO pratyekam anvayaH /

   krameṇodāharaṇam  	krameNa udAharaNam  
   "pratikūlatāmupagate hi vidhau viphalatvameti bahusādhanatā /	"pratikUla tAm upagate hi viDO viPala tvam eti bahu sADana tA /

   atra "vidhau" iti vidhuvidhiśabdayorukārekārayoraukārarūpatvācchleṣaḥ /	atra "viDO" iti viDu viDi SabdayoH ukArekArayoH OkAra rUpa tvAt SlezaH /

   viphalatvameti ityarthaḥ /	viPala tvam eti iti arTaH /

   "kiraṇā hariṇāṅkasya dakṣiṇaśca samīraṇaḥ /	"kiraNAH hariNa aFkasya dakziNaH ca samIraNaH /

   "vikasannetranīlābje tathā tanvyāḥ stanadvayī /	"vikasat netra nIla abje taTA tanvyAH stana dvayI /

        netrapakṣe   lasantī te tarale ceti samāse /	netra pakze   lasantI te tarale ca iti samAse /

        atrāpītyarthaḥ /	atra api iti arTaH /
        atra liṅgaśleṣaṃ vinā dattāmityatra vacanaśleṣaḥ /	atra liFga Slezam vinA dattAm iti atra vacana SlezaH /
        vacanaśleṣaṃ vinā liṅgaśleṣastu "haristannāma cāghanut" iti /	vacana Slezam vinA liFga SlezaH tu "hariH tad nAma ca aGa nut" iti /

   "ayaṃ sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi hṛdi jñeṣu ca vakṣyati /	"ayam sarvANi SAstrANi hRdi jQezu ca vakzyati /

   atra "vakṣyati" iti vahi vacyoḥ, "sāmarthyakṛt" iti kṛntati karotyoḥ	atra "vakzyati" iti vahi vacyoH, "sAmarTya kRt" iti kRntati karoti oH

        (vi, ṭha) prakṛtiśleṣamāha   ayamiti /	(vi, Wa) prakRti Slezam Aha   ayam iti /

   "yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto	"yena Dvasta manoBavena bali jit kAyaH purA astrI kRtaH 
   yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /	yaH ca udvRtta BujaFga hAra valayaH gaFgAm ca yaH aDArayat /
   yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarā /	yasya AhuH SaSimat SiraH haraH iti stutyam ca nAma amarAH /
   pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ" //	pAyAt sa svayam anDaka kzaya karaH tvAm sarva domADavaH" //
   atra "yena " ityādau sabhṅgaśleṣaḥ /	atra "yena " ityAdO saBFga SlezaH /

        tvāṃ sarvadā sa umādhavaḥ sarvado mādhavaśca pāyāt /	tvAm sarvadA saH umADavaH sarva daH mADavaH ca pAyAt /
        tatra mādhavapakṣe, abhavena anutpattinā yena anaḥ śakaṭaṃ dhvastaṃ	tatra mADava pakze, aBavena anutpattinA yena anaH Sakawam Dvastam

   na ca "andhakakṣaya" ityādau śabdābhedaḥ, "arthabhedena śabdabhedaḥ" iti	na ca "anDaka kzaya" ityAdO Sabda aBedaH, "arTa Bedena Sabda BedaH" iti
   darśanāt /	darSanAt /
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, pha) mataviśeṣe tu yatra nānārthasthale 'pi śabdabhedastathā ca	(vi, Pa) mata viSeze tu yatra nAnA arTa sTale api Sabda BedaH taTA ca
   tatrāpi śliṣṭānekaśabdakṛtaḥ śabdālaṅkārastanmate nirbādha eveti tanmataṃ	tatra api Slizwa aneka Sabda kRtaH Sabda alaFkAraH tad mate nirbADaH eva iti tat matam
   darśayati   na cāndhaka iti /	darSayati   na ca anDakaH iti /
        na ca śabdābheda ityanvayaḥ /	na ca Sabda aBedaH iti anvayaH /
        tatra hetumāha   arthabhedeneti /	tatra hetum Aha   arTa Bedena iti /
        ghaṭapaṭarūpārthabhedena ghaṭapaṭaśabdabhedanādityarthaḥ /	Gawa pawa rUpa arTa Bedena Gawa pawa Sabda BedanAt iti arTaH /
        tathā caitad dṛṣṭāntenaivārthabhedasya śabdabhedavyāpyatvasiddhiriti	taTA ca etat dRzwAntena eva arTa Bedasya Sabda Beda vyApya tva sidDiH iti
   bhāvaḥ /	BAvaH /
        na ca tatkathaṃ nānārthakaśabdāḥ śrūyante iti	na ca tat kaTam nAnA arTaka SabdAH SrUyante iti
   vācyam  ekaprayatnoccāryyatvadoṣeṇa bhedāgrahāt /	vAcyam   eka prayatna uccAryya tva dozeNa Beda agrahAt /
        Locanā:	LocanA:
        (lo, ū) naca tanniyamanamātreṇābhaṅgasya śabdaśleṣatvaṃ,	(lo, U) na ca tad niyamana mAtreNa aBaFgasya Sabda Sleza tvaM,
   śabdabhedādapi ityāha  naceti /	Sabda BedAt api iti Aha  naca iti /
        hetumāha  arthabhedeneti /	hetum Aha  arTa Bedena iti /
        darśanād yuṣmābhireva siddhāntāt pramāṇīkṛtāditi śeṣaḥ /	darSanAt yuzmABiH eva sidDAntAt pramANIkRtAt iti SezaH /
        ********** END OF COMMENTARY **********	********** END OF SOMMENTa aRY **********
   kiṃ cātra śabdasyaiva mukhyatayā vaicitryabodhopāyatvena	kim ca atra Sabdasya eva muKya tayA vEcitrya boDa upAya tvena
   kavipratibhayoṭṭaṅkanācchabdālaṅkāratvameva /	kavi pratiBaya uwwaFkanAt Sabda alaFkAra tvam eva /
   visadṛśaśabdadvayasya bandhe cevaṃvidhasya vaicitryābhāvād vaicitryasyaiva	visadRSa Sabda dvayasya banDe ca ivaMviDasya vEcitrya aBAvAt vEcitryasya eva
   cālaṅkāratvāt /	ca alaFkAra tvAt /

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:

   rupakādiṣu sāmyasya vyaṅgyatvam, vyatireke ca vaidharmyasyāpyuktiḥ,	rupaka Adizu sAmyasya vyaFgya tvam, vyatireke ca vEDarmyasya api uktiH,

   "āhave jagaduddaṇḍa ! rājamaṇḍalārāhave /	"a Ahave jagat uddaNxa ! rAja maNxala ArAhave /
   śrīnṛsiṃhamahīpāla ! svastyastu tava bāhave" //	SrI nRsiMha mahIpAla ! svasti astu tava bAhave" //
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ka) āhaveti   he nṛsiṃhamahīpāla ! tava bāhave hastāya	(vi, ka) Ahava iti    he nRsiMha mahIpAla ! tava bAhave hastAya
   svastyastu /	svasti astu /
        kīdṛśāya   āhave yuddhe jagatyuddaṇḍaṃ rājamaṇḍalaṃ nṛpatimaṇḍalameva	kIdRSAya   Ahave yudDe jagati uddaNxam rAja maNxalam nRpati maNxalam eva
   rājamaṇḍaṃla candramaṇḍalaṃ tadīyarāhave saihikeyāya tattiraskārakatvāt /	rAjamaNxaMla candra maNxalam tadIyara Ahave sEhikeyAya tad tiraskAraka tvAt /
        atra nṛpatimaṇḍalasambandhitvena rāhutvāropo 'nupapannaḥ	atra nRpati maNxala sambanDi tvena rAhu tva AropaH anupapannaH
   rāhornṛpatimaṇḍalatiraskārakatvābhāvāt /	rAhoH nRpati maNxala tiraskAraka tva aBAvAt /
        ato mukhyatadāropasādhako nṛpatimaṇḍale candramaṇḍalāropaḥ /	atas muKya tadAropa sADakaH nRpati maNxale candra maNxala AropaH /
        śliṣṭarājaśabdena ca tadubhayopasthāpanam etadāha   atreti /	Slizwa rAja Sabdena ca tad uBaya upasTApanam etat Aha   atra iti /
        atra ca mukhyarūpakanirvāhāya dvayornṛpaticandrayoḥ	atra ca muKya rUpaka nirvAhAya dvayoH nRpati candrayoH
   prākaraṇikatvādādāveva nṛpacandro rājapadavācyo na tu candro vyaṅgyaḥ /	prAkaraNika tvAt AdO= eva nRpa candraH rAja pada vAcyaH na tu candraH vyaFgyaH /
        ekārthamātre prakaraṇatve evānyārthasya vyaṅgyatvāt /	eka arTa mAtre prakaraNa tve eva anya arTasya vyaFgya tvAt /
        ato nātra vācyasādhakatvavyaṅgyarūpasya	atas na atra vAcya sADaka tva vyaFgya rUpasya
   vācyasiddhyāṅgākhyaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvasya prasaktiḥ /	vAcya sidDyA aFga AKya guNIBUta vyaFgya tvasya prasaktiH /
        yatra tu kasyacidāropaṃ vinaiva prathamaṃ mukhyarūpakaṃ siddhyati	yatra tu kasyacid Aropam vinA eva praTamam muKya rUpakam sidDyati
   paścāttādṛśanirūpyamāṇasyāparapadārthānvayānupapattistatraprākaraṇike	paScAt tAdRSa nirUpyamANasya apara padArTa anvaya anupapattiH tatra prAkaraNike
   tādṛśāparapadārthe niyantrakasya śliṣṭaśabdasyāparārtho	tAdRSa apara pada arTe niyantrakasya Slizwa Sabdasya apara arTaH 
   mukhyarūpamāṇasyāparapadārthānvayānupapattirirāsāya rūpyamāṇe vyaṅgya eva;	muKya rUpamANasya apara padArTa anvaya anupapattiH irAsAya rUpyamANe vyaFgyaH eva;
   tatra vācyasiddhyaṅgataiva tasya /	tatra vAcya sidDi aFga tA eva tasya /

   śarīrasādaṃ ca /	SarIra sAdam ca /

   halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyam /	halAhalam vyaFgyam /

        tena prakṛte parvatasādṛśyād uccatvādeva stanarūpaṇamityuktamanena /	tena prakRte parvata sAdRSyAt ucca tvAt eva stana rUpaNam iti uktam anena /
        nanu yadi sādṛśyāsattve eva paramparitarūpakaṃ, tadā " padmodaya"	nanu yadi sAdRSya asattve eva paramparita rUpakaM, tadA " padma udaya"
   ityādāvavyāptirityākṣipati   tarhi iti /	iti AdO= avyAptiH iti Akzipati   tarhi iti /
        avyāptimupapādayati /	avyAptim upapAdayati /
        rājāderiti /	rAja AdeH iti /
        natu tadvivakṣitamiti /	na tu tad vivakzitam iti /
        yattuvivakṣitaṃ tadāha   padmodayādereveti /	yat tu vivakzitam tat Aha    padma udaya AdeH eva iti /
        padmodayādiśliṣṭapadasyaiva ityarthaḥ /	padma udaya Adi Slizwa padasya eva iti arTaH /
        Locanā:	LocanA:
        (lo, e) karādiśabdasya śliṣṭatvena śliṣṭaparamparitaśaṅkāṃ	(lo, e) kara Adi Sabdasya Slizwa tvena Slizwa paramparita SaFkAm
   nirākaroti   naceti /	nirAkaroti   nacA iti /
        rājādau śātravādirūpe suvyaktamityataḥ pūrvamastyeveti śeṣaḥ /	rAja AdO SAtrava Adi rUpe su vyaktam iti atas pUrvam asti eva iti SezaH /
        padmodayetyādau pradyotattejasvitādikameva sādṛśyam /	padma udaya ityAdO pradyotat tejasvi ta Adikam eva sAdRSyam /
        padmodayāderiva sakalakalaṃ puramityādāvupamāyāṃ sakalakalatvasyeva	padma udaya AdeH iva sakala kalam puram iti AdO= upamAyAm sakala kala tvasya iva
   ityarthaḥ /	iti arTaH /
        rājadinādhīśayoḥ prakṛte yojayati  iha tviti /	rAja dina aDISayoH prakRte yojayati  iha tu iti /
        iha karamudayamahīdharastanāgra ityādau /	iha karam udaya mahIDara stana agraH ityAdO /
        tuḥ punararthaḥ /	tuH punar arTaH /
        evaṃ ca "bhramimarati " mityādau viṣaṃ jalameva viṣamityāropo jalade	evam ca "Bramim arati " mityAdO vizam jalam eva vizam iti AropaH jalade
   prasiddhasādṛśyabhujagasyārope nimittamiti śliṣṭaparamparitameva /	prasidDa sAdRSya Bujagasya Arope nimittam iti Slizwa paramparitam eva /
        atra "vidvanmānasahaṃsa" ityādau rājādau haṃsatvāropo mānase	atra "vidvat mAnasa haMsa" ityAdO rAja AdO haMsa tva AropaH mAnase
   mānasatvārope heturiti manyamānā āhuḥ  "neha viṣaśabdasya dvyarthatā	mAnasa tva Arope hetuH iti manyamAnAH AhuH  "na iha viza Sabdasya dvi arTa tA
   "vidvanmānasahaṃsa" ityādāviva jalade bhujagāropahetukā, kintu	"vidvat mAnasa haMsa" iti AdO= iva jalade BujagAropa hetukA, kintu
   etatpadyāvasthitavaidyaśāstraprasiddhabhramādimaraṇāntāṣṭavidhagaralakāryyaviśeṣotthāpiteti	etat padya avasTita vEdya SAstra prasidDa Brama Adi maraNa anta azwaviDa garala kAryya viSeza utTApitA iti
   dvyarthatāyāstādātmyāropaṇaṃ vinā prasiddheriha śleṣālaṅkāra eveti /	dvi arTa tAyAH tAdAtmya AropaNam vinA prasidDeH iha Sleza alaFkAraH eva iti /
        '; tadayuktam /	a; tat ayuktam /
        jalade bhujagasādṛśyasya sakalakalaṃ puramityādāviva viṣaśabdasya	jalade Bujaga sAdRSyasya sakala kalam puram iti AdO= iva viza Sabdasya
   dvyarthatāṃ vinānupapatteḥ /	dvi arTa tAm vinA anupapatteH /
        kiñca jaladabhujagajaṃ viṣaṃ jalamiti na ghaṭate /	kiQca jalada Bujaga jam vizam jalam iti na Gawate /
        jaladasya bhujagatāyā avāstavatvād bhujagācca jalajanmānibandhanāt /	jaladasya Buja gatAyAH avAstava tvAt BujagAt ca jala janma anibanDanAt /
        tasmād viṣameva viṣamiti rūpaṇamākṣipyaiva vācyarūpaṇaṃ saṃgacchate /	tasmAt vizam eva vizam iti rUpaNam Akzipya eva vAcya rUpaNam saMgacCate /
        naca śleṣamātneṇāstu vācyarūpaṇopapattiriti yuktaṃ, śleṣeṇa	na ca Sleza mAtneNa aH tu vAcya rUpaNA upapattiH iti yuktaM, SlezeNa
   tādātmyāpratīteḥ /	tAdAtmya apratIteH /

        anyathā "vidvanmānasahaṃsa" ityādāvapi tathāprasaṅgaḥ syāt /	anyaTA "vidvat mAnasa haMsa" iti AdO= api taTA aprasaFgaH syAt /
        "ābhāti te kṣitibhṛtaḥ kṣaṇadānibheyaṃ	"a ABAti te kzitiBRtaH kzaNadA niBeyam
   nistriṃśamāṃsalatamālavanāntalekhā /	nistriMSa mAMsala tamAla vana anta leKA /
        indutviṣo yudhi haṭhena tavārikīrtti  rānīya yatra ramate	indu tvizaH yuDi haWena tavAri kIrtti rAnIya yatra ramate
   taruṇapratāpaḥ" //	taruNa pratApaH" //
        iha ekadeśavarttini rūpake kṣitibhṛd rājā eva kṣitibhṛt parvata iti	iha eka deSavarttini rUpake kzitiBRt rAjA eva kzitiBRt parvataH iti
   śliṣṭam /	Slizwam /

   nistriṃśasya tamālavanatvāropaṇe heturiti śliṣṭaparimparitamādriyante /	nistriMSasya tamAlavana tva AropaNe hetuH iti Slizwa parimparitam Adriyante /

   mānasatvāde rājño haṃsatvādirūpaṇanimittamiva, nistriṃśasya	mAnasa tvAde rAjQaH haMsa tva Adi rUpaNa nimittam iva, nistriMSasya
   tamālavanatvarūpaṇopayogitvam /	tamAla vana tva rUpaNa upayogi tvam /

   pratāpakīrttyornāyikanāyikātvopakaraṇatvād iha prakṛtasūtroktaṃ	pratApa kIrttyoH nAyika nAyikA tva upakaraNa tvAt iha prakRta sUtra uktam
   śliṣṭaikadeśarūpyaṃ sāvayavaikadeśavivartirūpakameva bhāvituṃ yuktaṃ, natu	Slizwa eka deSa rUpyam sa avayava eka deSa vivarti rUpakam eva BAvitum yuktaM, na tu
   śliṣṭaparamparitamiti manyāmahe /	Slizwa paramparitam iti manyAmahe /
        kiñca śliṣṭaparamparite vidvanmānasahaṃsetyādau rājño haṃsatvaṃ	kiQca Slizwa paramparite vidvan mAnasa haMsa ityAdO rAjQaH haMsa tvam

        kiñca sāvayave rūpake kvacidekaikasya	kiQca sa avayave rUpake kvacid ekEkasya
   sādṛśyāprasiddherapyekobhūyānyonyasāhāyyena sādṛśyapratītiḥ /	sAdRSya aprasidDeH api ekaH BUya anyonya sAhAyyena sAdRSya pratItiH /
        yathā   rāvaṇāvagrahetyādau marudādīnāṃ śasyatvādeḥ /	yaTA a    rAvaNa avagrahA ityAdO marut AdInAm Sasya tva AdeH /

        kevalaṃ mānasādipadeṣu ākṣipyamāṇaṃ sarovarādyartharūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ	kevalam mAnasa Adi padezu AkzipyamANam sarovara Adi arTa rUpam vyaFgyam
   haṃsatvādisādhakamātram /	haMsa tva Adi sADaka mAtram /

   bhātīti tamaso bahulībhāvāt haṭharamaṇopayogiteti prācyānāmapi vyākhyā /	BAti iti tamasaH bahulIBAvAt haWa ramaNa upayogi tA iti prAcyAnAm api vyAKyA /

        "dyāmāliliṅga, mukhamāśudiśāṃ cucumba rūddhāmbaraḥ śaśikalāmalikhat	"dyAm Ali liFga, muKam ASudiSAm cucumba rUdDa ambaraH SaSi kalAma liKat
   karagraiḥ /	karagrEH /

   nayadīkṣaṇāgniḥ //	naya dIkzaNa agniH //

   prathamamabhidhāyā viśrāmād vyañjanayaiva yuvarūpor'thaḥ pratīyate /	praTamam aBiDAyAH viSrAmAt vyaQjanayA eva yuvarUpor aTaH pratIyate /
        iha tu kṣitibhṛta ityādau bahūnāṃ rūpaṇāt pratāpasya taruṇatvarūpaṇaṃ	iha tu kzitiBRtaH ityAdO bahUnAm rUpaNAt pratApasya taruNa tva rUpaNam
   śābdam /	SAbdam /
        itaśca ramata ityādipadānāṃ rūpakasādhakataiva, natu dyāmāliliṅga	itas ca ramataH ityAdi padAnAm rUpaka sADaka tA eva, na tu dyAma ali liFga
   ityādāvāliṅganādīnāmiva samāsoktisādhakatā /	iti AdO= AliFgana AdInAm iva samAsokti sADaka tA /

   lakṣyasyāprasiddheḥ /	lakzyasya aprasidDeH /

   kvacitsamāsābhāve 'pi rūpakaṃ dṛśyate  	kvacid samAsa aBAve api rUpakam dRSyate  
   "mukhaṃ tava kuraṅgākṣi ! sarojamiti nānyathā" /	"muKam tava kuraFga akzi ! sarojam iti na anyaTA" /
   kvacidvaiyadhikaraṇye 'pi yathā  	kvacid vEyaDikaraNye api yaTA

   kvacidvaidharmye 'pi yathā  	kvacid vEDarmye api yaTA  
   "saujanyambumarusthalī sucaritālekhyadyubhittirguṇajyotsnākṛṣṇacaturdaśī	"sOjanI ambu maru sTalI su carita AleKya dyuBittiH guNa jyotsnA kRzNa caturdaSI

   bhaktimātrasulabhe sevā kiyatkauśalam" //	Bakti mAtra sulaBe sevA kiyat kOSalam" //
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ta) kvacid vaidharmye 'pi iti /	(vi, ta) kvacid vEDarmye api iti /
        rūpyarūpakayorviruddhadharmo nār'thaḥ /	rUpya rUpakayoH virudDa DarmaH nAr aTaH /
        kintu nirdiṣṭaṃ yatsādharmyaṃ tadabhāvavattvamevātra vaidharmyam /	kintu nirdizwam yat sADarmyam tat aBAvavat tvam eva atra vEDarmyam /
        saujanyāmbiti /	sOjanya ambiti /
        atra kaliyuge yairdurāśayā eṣā rājāvalī nṛpaśreṇī sevitā	atra kali yuge yEH durASayA ezA rAjA AvalI nRpa SreNI sevitA
   bhaktimātrasulabhe śūlini teṣāṃ sevā kiyat kauśalam /	Bakti mAtra sulaBe SUlini tezAm sevA kiyat kOSalam /
        rājāvalī kīdṛśī ? saujanyarūpasyāmbuno marusthalī /	rAjAvalI kIdRSI ? sOjanya rUpasya ambunaH maru sTalI /
        atrābhinnatvena nirdiṣṭayoḥ saujanyāmbunorubhayadharmatā iti /	atra aBinna tvena nirdizwayoH sOjanya ambunoH uBaya DarmatA iti /
        tayorabhāvatvameva dvayormarurājāvalyoryathoktaṃ vaidharmyam /	tayoH aBAva tvam eva dvayoH maru rAja AvalyoH yaTA uktam vEDarmyam /
        evamuttarottaraṃ bodhyam /	evam uttarottaram boDyam /
        sucaritarūpaṃ yadālekhyaṃ vastu, tasya dyurūpā gaganarūpā	su carita rUpam yadAleKyam vastu, tasya dyurUpA gagana rUpA
   bhittirāśrayaḥ /	BittiH ASrayaH /
        guṇarūpāyāḥ jyotstrāyāḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśī /	guNa rUpAyAH jyotstrAyAH kRzNa caturdaSI /
        saralatāyogaśvapucchacchaṭā /	sara latA yoga Sva pucCa= CawA /
        atra chaṭāpadaṃ svarūpārthakam /	atra CawApadam svarUpa arTakam /
        tathā saralatāyāḥ yogasya sambandhasya kukkurapucchasvarūpetyarthaḥ /	taTA sarala tAyAH yogasya sambanDasya kukkura pucCa svarUpA iti arTaH /
        sarvatra nirdiṣṭadharmābhāvo bodhyaḥ /	sarvatra nirdizwa Darma aBAvaH boDyaH /
        Locanā:	LocanA:
        (lo, o) vaidharmyeṇa, vaiparītyena, samānadharmarūpatānāpannena /	(lo, o) vEDarmyeNa, vEparItyena, samAna Darma rUpa tAnApannena /

   idaṃ mama /	idam mama /
   atra ca keṣāñcidrūpakāṇāṃ śabdaśleṣamūlatve 'pi	atra ca kezAQcit rUpakANAm Sabda Sleza mUla tve api

   Locanā:	LocanA:
   (lo, au) nanu padmodayetyādau paramparitādeḥ	(lo, O) nanu padma udaya ityAdO paramparita AdeH
   śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvātkathaṃ vār'thālaṅkāramadhye gaṇanamityata	Sabda anvaya vyatireka anuviDAyi tvAt kaTam vAr aTa alaFkAra maDye gaNanam ityata
   āha   atreti /	Aha   atra iti /

   śrīkaṇṭhajanapadavarṇane  "vajrapañjaramiti śaraṇāgataiḥ, ambaravivaramiti	SrIkaNWa janapada varNa ne  " vajrapaQjaram iti SaraNa AgatEH, ambara vivaram iti
   vātikaiḥ" ityādiścātiśayoktervivikto viṣayaḥ /	vAtikEH" ityAdiH ca atiSaya ukteH viviktaH vizayaH /
   iha ca rūpakālaṅkārayogaḥ" /	iha ca rUpaka alaFkAra yogaH" /
   vastutastu  "ambaravivaram " ityādau bhrāntimantamevecchanti na rūpakam,	vastu tas tu  "ambara vivaram " ityAdO BrAntimantam eva icCanti na rUpakam,
   bhedapratītipuraḥ sarasyaivāropasya gauṇīmūlarūpakādiprayojakatvāt /	Beda pratIti puras sarasya eva Aropasya gONI mUla rUpaka Adi prayojaka tvAt /
   yadāhuḥ śarīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne śrīvācaspatimiśrāḥ 	yat AhuH SarIrakamI mAMsA BAzya vyAKyAne SrI vAcaspati miSrAH

   hetuḥ, tadanupādāne tu lajjāhetvadarśanāllajjotprekṣā pramātrā boddhā	hetuH, tad anupAdAne tu lajjA hetu adarSanAt lajjA utprekzA pramAtrA bodDA

        naca samānabalatayānekakoṭisphuraṇamapītyāha  vyāpanāderiti /	na ca samAna bala tayA aneka kowi sPuraNam api iti Aha   vyApana AdeH iti /
        anye  ekadeśinaḥ /	anye  eka deSinaH /
        anirdhāraṇam  saṃśayabījaikadeśaḥ /	anirDAraNam   saMSaya bIja eka deSaH /

        tamovarṇanasyeti /	tamaH varNa nasya iti /

        tasya vyañjanayā bodhe tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ /	tasya vyaQjanayA boDe tu dRzwAntaH /
        sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāmiti /	sADarmya vEDarmyAByAm iti /

   aupamyagarbhatvaṃ punastridhā sambhavati, upamārūpasaṅkaragarbhatvāt /	Opamya garBa tvam punar triDA samBavati, upamA rUpa saFkara garBa tvAt /

   tatropamāgarbhatve yathā  	tatra upamAgarBa tve yaTA  
   "adantaprabhāpuṣpacitā pāṇipallavaśobhinī /	"adanta praBA puzpa citA pANi pallava SoBinI /

   "aindraṃ dhanuḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa śaraddadhānārdranakhakṣatābham /	"A Endram DanuH pANxu payoDareNa Sarad daDAna Ardra naKa kzata ABam /
   pramodayantī sakalaṅkaminduṃ tāpaṃ raverabhyadhikaṃ cakāra" //	pramodayantI sa kalaFkam indum tApam raveH aByaDikam cakAra" //
        ************* COMMENTARY *************	************* SOMMENTa aRY *************
        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:

        Vijñapriyā:	VijQa priyA:
        (vi, ha) vyavahāro 'thaveti /	(vi, ha) vyavahAraH aTavA iti /
        aindraṃ dhanurityādau upamānopameyabhāvavaiparītyasañcāraṇokteḥ	Endram DanuH iti AdO upamAna upameya BAva vEparItya saQcAraNa ukteH

        pūrvāvasthāto 'nyārāpitavyaṅgyavyavahārarūpakāvasthāto viśeṣayati	pUrva avasTAtaH anya ArApita vyaFgya vyavahAra rUpaka avasTAtaH viSezayati

   niṣpādyatvādanayoratrānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvarūpasaṅkara ityāha   evaṃ ceti	nizpAdya tvAt anayoH atra anugrAhya anugrAhaka BAva rUpa saFkaraH iti Aha   evam ca iti
        arthāntaranyāso samānyeneti /	arTa antaranyAsaH samAnyena iti /

        tathāhi kiṃ na hanti ityanena hantṛviśeṣasya strajo	taTA hi kim na hanti iti anena hantR viSezasya stra jaH 
   hananasāmarthyasattve 'pi hananābhāve viśeṣa uktaḥ /	hanana sAmarTya sattve api hanana aBAve viSezaH uktaH /

   īśvarecchādhīnāhitakāritvābhāvarūpa eva sādharmyāt /	ISvara icCA aDInAhita kAritva aBAva rUpaH eva sADarmyAt /

   "ākṛṣṭivegavigaladbhujagendrabhoga  nirmokapaṭṭapariveṣṭanāyāmburāśeḥ /	"a AkRzwi vega vigalat Bujaga indra Boga nirmoka pawwa parivezwanAya ambu rASeH /
   manthavyathāvyupaśamārthamivāśu yasya mandākinī ciramaveṣṭata pādamūle" //	manTa vyaTA vyupaSama arTam iva ASu yasya mandAkinI ciram avezwata pAda mUle" //

        akhilabhāṣaiva vilāsinī nāyikā tasyāḥ bhujaṅgaḥ	aKila BAzA eva vilAsinI nAyikA tasyAH BujaFgaH
   kāmukastadanuśīlakatvāt /	kAmukaH tad anuSIlaka tvAt /
        iti maheśvaratarkālaṅkāraviracitāyāṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṭīkāyāṃ	iti maheSvara tarka alaFkAra viracitAyAm sAhitya darpaNa wI kAyAm
   daśamaparicchedavivaraṇam suśliṣṭasaṃskṛtavaśena sukhādhirohā	daSama paricCeda vivaraNam su Slizwa saMskRta vaSena suKa aDirohA
   vaiṣamyadustarataraṅgavibhedadakṣā /	vEzamya dustara taraFga viBeda dakzAH /
        sāhityadarpaṇamahārṇavamuttarītuṃ ṭīkeyamastitaraṇirna bibhīta dhīrāḥ	sAhitya darpaNa mahA arNavam uttarItum wIkeyam astitaraNiH na biBIta DIrAH
        darpaṇe pratibimbante padārthā iti nādbhutam /	darpaNe pratibimbante padArTAH iti na adButam /
        citraṃ mamaitad vyākhyāne darpaṇaḥ pratibimbite // 2 //	citram mama etat vyAKyAne darpaNaH pratibimbite // 2 //
        avadhānakṛtāmodā ṭīkeyaṃ nāvadhīryatām /	avaDAna kRta AmodA wIkA iyam na avaDIryatAm /
        dhīrāḥ kaṣāyatāmbūle svādyante hi kramādrasāḥ //	DIrAH kazAya tAmbUle svAdyante hi kramAt rasAH //
        ********** END OF COMMENTARY **********	********** END OF SOMMENTa aRY **********
